name: [URGENT] Smartphone
description: Client requires a new smart phone for work, as he is working as a deliveroo delivery driver. Requires smart phone for navigation. His current one was accidentally broken by child with special needs.

contact.org: Allkin Family Service Centre @ Cheng San 445
contact.name: Nur Farisha

name: High cut shoes
description: This is a family of 4 and they have two school going children. One of their child is diagnosed with Autism Spectrum disorder. He tends to take out both his shoes and socks whenever they bring him out. Both parents have difficulty managing this behavior and this has been stressing them out. Their therapist recommended for them to get him a high cut shoes so that he won't be able to take out his shoes. However, father just started a full time job recently as he was on a few months break after a workplace accident. Mother is not able to work as she needs to care for both children. It has been financially tight for the family and a stressful time as they struggle to manage their son's behavior.

name: Wet food ( Urgent )
description: Family with 2 children aged 10 & 8 with autism requires 2 weeks supply of wet food ration especially for upcoming long holiday for CNY. Previous donations of wet food has been utilised. Father is the sole breadwinner and salary only comes in on 21st January. Mother is unable to work for now due to caregiving of children and multiple health issues that requires her to seek medical treatment. For more information, please contact me at 89407231.

name: Food Rations (Items need to be halal)
description:
Client is the sole breadwinner for his partner and his 4 children. His 4 children were previously residing with their mother, but due to concerns under her care, they have moved to stay with client. As such, client is facing a strained in his financial situation having to support 4 children. Client and his children would hence need support in getting some food rations and other items to ease their financial strain. 

Items needed:

4 packets of rice
8 packets of instant noodles 
Cooking Oil
20 x Canned food (or any amount is fine as well) - No turnip brand as it may not be halal.
Eggs
Frozen Food (e.g. nuggets, chicken)
Biscuits - Oreos
Chocolate Milk
Strawberry Milk
White Milk
Coffee

Any other items that can be stored are welcomed too (:

name: Food ration
description:
Requesting Halal food rations for needy families who may not have the money to buy food items due to financial issues. Items needed are as following:

- Halal Can Food [Meat - Sardine/Chicken etc] / [Vegetarian â€“ Corn/Mushroom etc]
- Bags of Rice (2/5 kg)
- Assorted Packet of Maggi Noodles [Chicken/Curry/Vegetarian]
- Packets of Bee Hoon (Chilli Brand etc.)
- Packets of Assorted Biscuits (Example: Khong guan biscuits/Jacob)
- Packets of 3-in-1 beverage (Milo/Horlicks/Tea/Coffee)
- Cooking oil (1L)
- Packets of Salt & Sugar
- Soya Sauce (Light/Dark)
- Evaporated Milk


Any amount is appreciated! Please call/email me before making any purchase as we have space constraint issues. Thank you!

name: Ensure Plus
description:
Client is a terminally ill patient who requires nutritional supplements of Ensure Plus Coffee as he has to take 3 bottles a day due to poor intake. For now he requires 1 month supply. He faces financial difficulties as he is not working and only 1 member of household of 3 is working, another is also ill. Has limited savings.

He takes 1-2 bottles a day and would require 1 month supply for now. Kindly contact Amanda social worker at 84282545.

description: Family of 9 requires wardrobe to organise and properly store their clothes. They are unable to afford their own as they rely on sole breadwinner's income for basic needs, and have very limited savings.

name: Wardrobe
description: Family consist of a mother and adult son. Both mother and son have intellectual disability and earn low income as cleaner and delivery work. They require a wardrobe to organise clothes and some bags at home. Preferably a 3-door wardrobe, which includes shelving/drawers.

name: Sliding Door Cupboard
description:
Client is low-income mother with special needs and chronic health condition. Her current cupboard is broken and acts as a safety hazard as the door can fall and hit her anytime. The cupboard is no longer usable, resulting in her cluttering of the household items around the flat and blocking of common passageway, being a fall hazard where she trips occasionally. Client lives in Tampines area and cannot afford to transport the item, would require donor to cover transport costs.

If you have suitable item for donation, feel free to drop me a message at 9296 0569 or email me at muhammadsuffian@mws.sg.

Thank you!

name: Cupboard
description: Family of 6 living in a 2-room rental flat is requesting for a clothes cupboard. Thank you.

The family does not have the financial mean to change the kitchen cabinet.

name: Children's Cupboard
description: Low-income family of 6 (parents and 4 children) is looking for a children's cupboard or dresser to store children's clothes. No specific measurements requirements. Family stays in rental unit and requires ad-hoc assistance in basic necessities. Any help is greatly appreciated. Thank you!

name: TV Console

If you have suitable item for donation, please feel free to whatsapp me at 9296 0569 or email me at muhammadsuffian@mws.sg

Thank you!

name: Medical bed/Electrically operated bed
description: A 75-year-old widowed woman, suffering from dementia and recently experiencing another stroke, is experiencing unilateral weakness. She is unable to independently get up and walk, making a regular bed relatively dangerous (prone to falling) and inconvenient for her. The client is keen on a home-use medical bed to alleviate the caregiving burden on her son. However, the son is the sole breadwinner, and his income cannot afford the expenses. They hope to find donors to help improve the quality of life for the client and her caregiver. We would be extremely grateful if the donor can cover the delivery costs. Please contact Hsin Yu via WhatsApp at 8911 8058 or email: hsinyu_lee@viriya.org.sg to liaise.

Client is a single mother who is staying with her 17 year old daughter in a rental flat. Client has depression and anxiety and has been certified unfit for employment due to her mental health conditions. Despite this, she currently takes on ad-hoc jobs to meet her familyâ€™s basic needs. Client also faces high stress at home as there are multiple risks concerns present in the family e.g. self-harm and violence. 

Client is hoping for a secondhand television (40 inch and above) to replace her current one, which is spoilt.  

If you're keen on donating a television, kindly WhatsApp or call me (Sarah) at 69783470, or reach my office at 64761481.

Thank you!

They are trying to apply for some assistance for milk and diapers in the long run but it will take some time. As such, it would be very helpful if a donor could support the family for 1-2 months or with any amount that you are comfortable with. The children consume 6 tins of Lactogen 2 1.8kg per month, 3 packets of L Drypers Pantz and 3 packets of XL Drypers Pantz. Please feel free to email me. Thank you so much for your help!

name: Milk & Diapers
description:
There are 7 children in the family (12F, 10M, 8F, 6F, 5F, 3F, 1M). Natural mother is a home-maker, and step-father (to oldest child 1 and 2) was previously laid off from his delivery job which was a non-contract job. He has been jobless for about 5 months now and has been looking for a job but to no avail finding a suitable one. Although SSO has been approved, family still struggles with groceries and especially needs for the younger kids as diapers and baby food are expensive. In addition, family also need to pay off their debts, pay for childrens' school fees, pay off rent, and manage their other day-to-day expenses. Family have been financially struggling and can benefit from any support they can get. Family requires support for the following for their children : 

Milk - Milk: Abbott Grow Toddler 3 ; 1-3 Year Old ( 2 tins )

Diapers - Any brand ( pull-up ; size L & XL ) 2 packets

name: Milk Powder and Diapers
description: Client has a large family with 5 young children. The family has high living expenses, and just started her new job. Currently, husband's pay is insufficient to provide for the children's needs. The family has been trying to get back on their feet again and has stopped getting financial assistance. However, finances is still tight for them as mum only just started work and it would be very helpful if a donor could provide the family with some milk powder and diapers for the next 1-2 months to ease their financial burden and ensure their younger kids' basic needs are still met. The family requires 3 tins of S26 Stage 3 and 3 XL and 3 XXL Huggies Diapers (Pantz) per month. Feel free to contact me for more information. I will only be able to reply on weekdays office hours. Feel free to email me too, and you can donate any amount that you are comfortable with, and it can be a one-off help too. Thank you very much for helping the family!

name: Double stroller/pram
description: Family has 5 children (1 toddler) and mum is expecting a baby girl in March. Father is working as a cleaner to support the family. Mum is looking for a double stroller to suit her 1 year old son and infant daughter so that she can run errands independently.

name: Huggies pull-up diapers: Size M Size L  Milk Powder Lactogen 2 x 2 tins Lactogen 3 x 2 tins

name: Milk Powder

name: Wheelchair

name: Electric Wheelchair
description:
Client is an amputee and has trouble moving around to get groceries for his elderly parents as his hands no longer have as much strength as it used to ever since he went through a number of operations in the hospital. 

If you have a suitable item for donation, feel free to drop me a text at 9296 0569 or drop me an email at muhammadsuffian@mws.sg. Thank you!

name: Motorised wheelchair
description:
Client is a terminally ill patient He faces financial difficulties as he is not working and only 1 member of household of 3 is working, another is also ill. Has limited savings. He is hoping for a motorised wheelchair so that he can independently go out on his own, something he is unable to do now without one.

Kindly contact social worker Amanda at 84282545 if keen to donate.

name: Standard Wheelchair
description: Single-parent family with a teenage son with high and special needs. Mother is unable to work due to caregiving requirements. Current wheelchair is too small for son.

name: Motorised Wheelchair

name: Tilted wheelchair

name: 20" Wheelchair

Family is on financial assistance as mother has chronic health conditions like cancer preventing her to work. Client stays at west area and would need donor to cover the delivery of the item to their place in view of their financial situation.

Thank you!

name: Wheelchair

15 year old youth had fractured his leg and family is unable to afford a wheelchair. Looking for a wheelchair for youth to travel more conveniently to and fro, and in school.

contact.org: SHINE Children and Youth Services - Hougang
contact.name: Ang Hua Jun

name: Wheelchair
description:
An elderly resident with mobility issues requires a wheelchair for her daily activities. The current wheelchair that she is using is not working well. Please feel free to reach out if you have a wheelchair to bless.

Thank you!

name: Light Weight Wheelchair
description: Client is a 73 year old elderly who suffers from parkinson's disease. She requires a light weight wheelchair as the current one she has is too heavy which makes it difficult for transferring onto and off taxis when going for medical appointments. Her friend, aged 60+, who takes her to these appointments finds that she is physically less able to handle the weight of her current wheelchair. Hence, a lighter weight simple wheelchair would help to reduce the physical strain on both elderly ladies.

name: Kitchen Items
description: Client (F/23) is a single mother with a son (M/1) with special needs and developmental delays. Client manages between her roles in parenting by bringing her child to therapies 3 times a week, and earns an income with her part-time work schedule. The family of two has limited support from their family and on financial stability and wishes to seek household items from kind donors as they settle into their new home in a rental flat. To uplift the family and allowing them to settle better into their new place, they are looking to get some kitchen items - pots & pans, spatula & ladle, cutleries, and an air fryer. They are also open to receive second-hand items that are Halal from kind donors, as they are from a Muslim family. Thank you!

name: Bicycle
description: Client is a single mother and the sole caregiver to three young children. Her husband does not provide financial support, and her income from employment is limited. Due to her caregiving commitments, she has faced limitations in securing stable employment. As such, the client has started working as a walker for food delivery. The availability of a bicycle would enable the client to make deliveries more efficiently, contributing to an increased income that can be used to meet the family's basic needs. Additionally, it would minimize the risk of the client becoming overworked and falling ill, which could have further negative consequences on the family's financial situation, overall well-being, and the client's ability to meet the caregiving needs of her children.

contact.org: MWS Covenant Family Service Centre - Hougang
contact.name: Reina Chantelle Reyes

name: Grocery trolley
description: Client is an elderly living alone with multiple health conditions, which limits her mobility and ADL functions. She is reliant on SSO FA for her monthly expenses and is unable to afford a new trolley. Her current trolley has spoilt, and she is unable to go grocery shopping for the time being. It would be helpful for her to receive one to aid her supermarket trips.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Services SSO @ Taman Jurong
